data.name: Tennis Fighters
data.detailed_description:
NEW CONCEPT GAME
Tennis Fighters is a whole new game genre where mixes a Tennis game & Fighting game. You will find a great tennis game with the action & effects of a fighting game (like health bar, power bar, special shots, etc…) The mechanics are simple, more points you do, more damage you make to your opponent.

GAMEPLAY
Our goal is to create a funny, competitive and depth gameplay. Tennis Fighters has the perfect balance between Simulation & Arcade style. With the intuitive control shot system, you can choose the power, direction and curve of every shot in the game, converting every match with a skill based challenge. By winning points, aces or breakpoints you will earn “Fighter Energy”, and when the bar is full you will be able to do the "Super Shots" (shots with top power and perfect accuracy).

ONLINE*
Our focus is the online multiplayer matches. We think that the players wants to play against others players so we want to build an online community for this new game genre. In this Early version you can join a match or create your own custom match by 3 or 5 sets (1P vs 1P).

OFFLINE*
With the training mode you can train your skills with the "AI". In order to improve your skills you can customize AI difficult to be sure you are comfortable with the level. Once you are ready, you can go to the online matches. Also you can play against the “Robot”, an special character difficult to win.

FEATURES*
· Funny & depth gameplay
· 5 dynamic cameras views
· 3 Tennis Fighters to select
· 3 Stadiums (3 daytimes for each)
· Multiplayer Online (1P V 1P)
· Multiplayer Offline (1P V 1P)
· Training mode ( 1P V Ai)

Choose your Fighter now, enter into the court and play for your live. Are you ready?!

*Right now this game is on Early Access, so there is more to come, like stadiums, players, online tournaments, leaderboards, etc… So we are open to your comments suggestions and ideas. Join today!

data.short_description: Tennis Fighters is a whole new game genre where mixes a Tennis game & Fighting game. You will find a great tennis game with the action & effects of a fighting game (like health bar, power bar, special shots, etc…) The mechanics are simple, more points you do, more damage you make to your opponent.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 1 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, 2 GB / AMD Radeon R9 280, 3 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.legal_notice: This game is an original work of art, and fictional in nature. Any character, name or gameplay are the product of the developers' imagination, or used as fiction. Any and all resemblance to actual names, characters, businesses, events and/or incidents are solely the products of the game developer’s imagination, and as such used as fiction. Any resemblance to actual persons or events is purely fictional.
